name: Spiiin
description:
I made this game for Ludum Dare 47!

Of course, there are only a few levels since I didn't have a lot of time, some of the assets are.. questionable, all of the sound is missing and I didn't get to add some cool things like screenshake. But I'm still proud of it! I had forgotten about Ludum Dare until the first day's morning and I didn't want to miss it this time, so I gave everything I had into this little game, hope you enjoy it!

NOTE: If you'd like a version where you can restart the game, for speedrunning for example, check this link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1pc3IRmDm8-dDLwGMkZomCajA9Arw3UPy?usp=sha...

It has the source code as well as a modified version where you can go back to the first screen by pressing Ctrl + R. I wasn't sure if I'm allowed to add this feature to my submission so I did this instead.
